body:
My friend Ethan has created a gaming forum, and we'll be running it. I don't think this would count as advertising, since only general Minecraft discussion is allowed, nothing server related. But it will focus on many games. We will be opening staff applications soon, so please stay tuned. I highly encourage you sign-up, you'll get to meet with players from many different Minecraft servers. Here is the link:

http://platinumgaming.x10.mx/index.php

It isn't full finished yet, but it should be soon :)
